pr_title: CLDR-14284 TestAttributeValues check for duplicates in space-separated attributes

timeline.bodyText: This does print an error and stop the test. There may be a more graceful way to fail.
timeline.author: srl295

timeline.message:
CLDR-14284 TestAttributeValues check for duplicates in space-separated attributes

- also removed a comment on a previously-duplicate grammaticalFeatures element
that was fixed with CLDR-13730

timeline.bodyText:
Looks good. Should add quick unit test.
Also, can be pithier. Split to list, then create set from it. If the sizes are not the same, fail.
timeline.author: macchiati

replies.bodyText:
Should add quick unit test.

TestAttributeValues already hits this, and is verified to fail on the "… fil fil …" case for grammatical features.

Also, can be pithier… If the sizes are not the same, fail

good point, will fix
replies.author: srl295
